website_summaries.verdict: Given this watch’s versatile style and reasonable price, it’s an impressive value. Formal enough for work but cool enough for a night out.
pros: Features true minimalist design with a striking black and red scheme
Keeps time accurately via its Japanese quartz technology
Watch is 10 millimeters thick, is made of scratch-resistant material, and maintains a matte look
cons: Watch doesn’t illuminate in the dark, so it’s impossible to tell time with it in low light settings

customer_reviews.title: Prettiest bracelet I own...but doesn't tell time unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this watch for a year and a half, and it's already been replaced once because it stopped keeping time. It's a shame, because I've received more compliments on its appearance than all the other watches I've ever owned combined. Unfortunately, the replacement has also stopped working and I don't care how pretty a watch is if it doesn't keep time.
customer_reviews.author: tangerine

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but isn't made very well.
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks so good. Super soft leather and a nice black face. But the problem is quality, but the watch doesn't feel too cheap to me as other people have said. But The problem is with the movement the second hand moves around a lot and the minute hand rock back-and-forth, depending on how your wrist moves. I don't think I would buy another watch from mvmt again. They look great but for the same price you can get a solid Nixon. Also the minuet hand is dirty on my watch. Problems with quality control. But it looks nice. Mine also seams to always be off a few minuets, I'm adjusting it is very few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it - Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my current watch face - only because its cheap and I previously bought all the bands. Its poorly made. One time swimming and the case leaked; not even 3ft deep and the thing got destroyed. Rusted out, full of condensation, etc. This watch wasn't even a year old. Like I said, I bought another face just to maximize the bands Ive already purchased. I wont be buying anything from MVMT again, and I suggest the same for whoever reads this. Its a cheap product; and by 'cheap' I don't mean just the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Broken in a month...
customer_reviews.text: The back of this watch came off in a month and we can't get it back on. It's a beautiful watch, but obviously not very durable. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Martinez

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T LOOK LIKE AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: I EXPECTED TO GET THE WATCH WITH A BLACK BAND LIKE SHOWN IN THE PICTURE, BUT I ENDED UP GETTING A BROWN BAND. I DONT LIKE THAT. OTHER THAN THAT, IT SEEMS FINE...FOR NOW. LOOKING AT THESE OTHER REVIEWS, MY EXPECTATIONS FOR LONGEVITY AREN'T TOO HIGH FOR THIS PIECE. THAT SUCKS CONSIDERING HOW MUCH I PAID FOR IT.😑
customer_reviews.author: dr_pope_er

customer_reviews.title: Time stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Time stopped working with 2 of my MVMT watches within 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this watch because of its great look. Received it and it looked great, then tried to set the time and the winder stem pulled right out of the watch case. Still think it's the best looking stainless steel watch on the market, in this price range, but what an inferior piece of junk! Now jumping through hoops trying to get a refund. Looks like they're going to be charging me fees to return the product! Shame on you AMAZON for even representing this company!
customer_reviews.author: Desertman

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a game changer. It turns heads and captures the attention of even the most lethargic observer. With this watch, the world is your oyster. When you walk into a room with this watch on, you will feel like a strapping Wookiee among a pack of chihuahuas.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very good watch, wear it daily, had to get 3 links removed to fit my watch, and was unable to do it myself — was under the impression i would be able to add/remove links myself — however good watch none the less, feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Time markers are not black as in the photo, but rather silver. The only reason I bought this was as a gift for my boyfriends birthday, but the product does not arrive as shown in advertisement photo. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Like but not Love this watch.
customer_reviews.text: I really do like: Like not love this watch. It does look really good. I guess it's just not a large and in your face as I thought it would be. Not really sure about water resistance and it of course has a black face and silver hands. I think it would be better if the hands were red like the second hand. I'll update on any complements and how it actually holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Varnado

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks bigger than the pictures I loved it but the size is a turn off
customer_reviews.author: brian ssekiziyivu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gift Option!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my significant other's birthday and he to say he loved it is an understatement. It's decently priced the quality of craftsmanship and aesthetic that you receive. Obviously, there are different styles available and this one fit his the most.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Eloise Velasco

customer_reviews.title: great watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: sleek, stylish, affordable. MVMT is a great way to keep your wrist in style but your wallet fat. its not too heavy on your wrist and not overbearing when you're wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: stephen a.

customer_reviews.title: I was sadly disappointed with the MVMT
customer_reviews.text: I read the comments about it being light and didn't think it would bother me... it does. It feels soooo cheap and empty. I was sadly disappointed with the MVMT, not sure what the hype was all about. Don't bother buying this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch does not function properly
customer_reviews.text: The time has to be reset every few days because it gets off. I would return it but I can't seem to get through to the seller. This is the second MVMT watch I have purchased but this is the only one with issues. I think I just got a bad watch. I would not buy through this seller again. Go straight through the MVMT website and maybe you'll avoid getting the reject watches.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Raya

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Four months into owning the watch, it became apparent that it approximated time as opposed to telling it. Not worth the money. It was great until it started needing to be adjusted every week. It will break in a few months after owning it.
customer_reviews.author: Theodora Moshouris

customer_reviews.title: The jury is still out
customer_reviews.text: it is a little larger than what i usually wear but it looks good. After wearing it for a day, I found out it doesn't keep very good time. I am going to document it and then reach out to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Stylsih and lightweight. Band stains easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great watch for the price. As some reviews stated, it's extremely lightweight- for my husband personally that was what he was looking for. He doesn't wear a watch every day and was pleased that it didn't feel heavy on his wrist. The only down side is the light colored band stains easily with water spots etc... I was hoping to find one with a leather band but liked the look of this so much I ordered anyway. Replacement bands are available on MVMT website.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn’t keep time
customer_reviews.text: Cons: I had the watch for a month. It didn’t ever keep time. Had to adjust it constantly. Also, I have a nickel allergy. This watches clasp is not nickel free so it made me break out. Pros: Beautiful watch. Got a lot of compliments on it. Wish it had worked out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: You get more than what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people slag this brand of because of the lightweight quality and material. So what? I wasn’t looking for a Rolex. I was looking for a functional watch that wouldn’t weigh me down and look nice. And that’s exactly what I got. I’ve been very happy with this purchase and look forward to buying more of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Gifted to my son as a gift in college
customer_reviews.text: My son is currently enrolled in pharmacy school and during a white coat ceremony was gifted this beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.author: G.S.K. Mendota

customer_reviews.title: Quality is eh
customer_reviews.text: So looks pretty good. Works fine but it obvious that’s this is a cheap watch. It serves it purpose but don’t expect the best Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Junk quality, but looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the first watch because of a wandering minute hand. The replacement watch does the same thing. Minute hand wobbles 1-2 minutes if you move your arm around. If I could return it I would, but I'm passed the 30 day limit. It's a junk watch that looks good, thats it. Attractive but won't last you long. I opened the back up and there is literally nothing to this watch..it is made the same as the $20 watched you get at a gas station.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design, great for the business man
customer_reviews.text: Husband is a fan of MVMT. Ordered this on amazon cause it was faster than ordering on their website. The quality of their watches is great. Sleek and perfect for a business man. Exactly as pictured, can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bríe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful casual look
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, no frills, band is lightweight but not too cheap. It's kind of a nice "everything" watch. Maybe not enough bling for a wedding, but it works for pretty much everything else. It's kinda plain, yet classy. I love the large 45mm dial. I liked this watch enough to buy another model in black. My only concern would be how well the crystal holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Day

customer_reviews.title: Best watch made for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Just right! Not only is this watch super aesthetically pleasing, it is well-built and very durable. I would definitely recommend any style of mvmt watches to anyone. I now own three, and I probably will buy two or three more. Quality all the way
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great for suits
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks, you will likely have to get a tool so you can adjust the size, but this was easily done. It is the perfect dress watch for starting my career in finance
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, nice price
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a graduation gift. My son loves it. He wears it frequently and it looks very nice. The watch band is not quite the rich looking brown pictured but pretty close. The watch looks nice. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Shade

customer_reviews.title: Really nicewatch. It loses a star for being overpriced--they ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch. It loses a star for being overpriced--they should really sell this for $65. -It's very light. -The face is very large--much larger than in the pictures--but the slim profile makes up for it. -The band is slightly darker than what is pictured. Overall I've really enjoyed this watch. It's kept time well. The price is too high, but if you like the style it's worth it. -If you can't tell from the picture, there is no lume. You cannot see this watch at all in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband a few years ago, and I just realized I never wrote a review. This watch is perfect. Low profile and stylish. My husband wears it everyday to work, and has received many compliments on it. The watch is excellent quality as well. He absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: juicebox

customer_reviews.title: very nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I really love this watch, it is better looking in person than in photos. The only thing that I don't like so much is the band because it is rather stiff. Hopefully it will soften with use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not really good
customer_reviews.text: It's really good watch but the only problem it has is, the handle is going to get nasty after u washed ur hand and it got wet. It's going to lose It's color and style
customer_reviews.author: Hassan Aghamohammadi

customer_reviews.title: very nice watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: this watch was a great price and i love the size of the case and band, and also the gray is a nice shade,
customer_reviews.author: greene

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and made perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: The watch came in and I must say, from the moment I opened the box it came in, everything was clean and slick. I will DEFINITELY be buying more from you guys.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: My wrist itself doesn't tell time like most robots. That's life though. Sometimes you gotta add hardware, sometimes software. In this case hardware. Great job. Great watch. I've never made a watch but if I did this is the one I would make.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Fashion Meets Function
customer_reviews.text: My new MVMT watch is really good-looking with a larger than most watch face. Easy to read and comfortable as well. A very good watch at a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret V.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend bought me a MVMT watch that I love, so when I was in the market for another new watch I went with this MVMT watch and I love it! Definitely gonna buy more of their watches--they are fly, and for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning watch. Never seen a grey watch like this. Hubby loved it as an anniversary present.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. It looks so nice. The grey is an onyx color not typical silver. My boyfriend loved it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyLair

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after a year
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch, but very low quality. The first MVMT watch I bought for my husband broke after 1 year (wouldn’t keep time anymore- wasn’t the battery). We mailed it back and got a replacement watch, and the replacement one broke again after 12 months (half the numbers fell off). Don’t waste your money if you want it to last longer than 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant looking watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is fantastic and looks very elegant. Only downside is the strap can get a bit dirty if you don't watch where you put your hand on. especially in dirty tables and dirty work environments. Still have yet to know how to clean the strap but other than that, everything is great!
customer_reviews.author: TheHondyssey

customer_reviews.title: This company is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love MVMT this company is great and the best customer service around. The product far exceeds expectations. Got one for my grandson he loves it will do him well in college. Love this company.
customer_reviews.author: Micki

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking watch. Keeps accurate time only minor negative is the band is a little stiff
customer_reviews.author: gdesmet

customer_reviews.title: Really good watch although the band does break relatively easily and ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good watch although the band does break relatively easily and the date doesn't auto reset after it goes past 31st. It's a good watch for the price though. As well as it being pretty hard to move the crown in order to change the time it looks really sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Coleman Gee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend and he loved it! It looks so nice on him and he has not had any issues with it. The face is a little on the bigger side but looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Valentines Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a valentines gift for my husband, and I nailed it! The rose gold looks great in person and has an understated quality to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytee

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loved it
customer_reviews.text: It's sleek, modern and very attractive. Needed to resize it and the chains were perfectly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lana0021

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, got so many compliments on it. I got it for my birthday, and first was somewhat skeptical, if I even need a watch. Now I can't go a day without it. Good size, durable material and most importantly accurate time. I like the flexibility of exchanging the bands, however I did not have a change to purchase any yet. Overall stylish, semi-pricy watch.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Decent watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a while then back case popped open and had to take to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Castellano

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: When they first came out in the market I bought this watch. I love MVMT brand.
customer_reviews.author: OH

customer_reviews.title: Was very nice looking and so far has held up
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had put this on my "wish list" on Amazon so bought this for his birthday. Was very nice looking and so far has held up well
customer_reviews.author: ilovetosave

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Gave this wacht to my father for his birthday and he just loved it
customer_reviews.author: frank rivera

customer_reviews.title: I really liked it, simple and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it, simple and stylish. Very versatile to combine with different outfits. took me a little to figure out how to adjust the date, simply pull the crown halfway and rotate towards yourself to adjust date ( doesn't work if you rotate to the other side, so if you skip the day, you have to go around again). pull it fully outward for standard time adjustment..
customer_reviews.author: daniel calvo

customer_reviews.title: ok watch
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the 100.00 cost...Invicta has these people totally beat......
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite watch!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves MVMT, so we got this as a gift for his best man. By far my favorite MVMT watch I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: jenniferann244

customer_reviews.title: Classy!
customer_reviews.text: Got a lot of compliments at work the first day I wore it.
customer_reviews.author: William Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I get my boyfriend a new watch every year and this is his new favorite! Great fit, looks really sleek and classy.
customer_reviews.author: Sabismabi

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great and it looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a surprise gift for my husband. I showed it to friends and family first, and they all thought it was a very expensive designer watch. The contrast of the black and brown goes well together. The quality is great and it looks expensive. He loves it. I'ts one of his favorite watches.
customer_reviews.author: Jonita

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch. Bought for my son for Christmas he seems to like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Goodchild

customer_reviews.title: Great quality with simplistic yet loud style
customer_reviews.text: Have been checkin this brand of watch in the last year. Great quality with simplistic yet loud style. Gonna purchase the Rose Gold / Brown strap for formal functions on February.
customer_reviews.author: Roden Medalle

customer_reviews.title: It’s good looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought the watch for myself and probably by another one. I like it and the way it looks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy $$$
customer_reviews.text: Super stoked to have this watch!! It feels a little bit over priced though. $60-70 is more realistic. But other than my price it blew my expectations out of the water! You will get comments and compliments on the watch! Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: looks and feels like a couple hundred dollar watch so very worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Bloom

customer_reviews.title: A stylish timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with this watch. It looks good and keeps great time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Better in person
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for my boyfriend and he loves it! He's been wanting a MVMT watch for years. I provided a picture of our his and hers mvmt watches we purchased :)
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful piece! My second MVMT watch, only brand I will buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fiene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sexy and suave watch! My husband loves it but just don't get water or liquid on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Date mechanism never worked.
customer_reviews.text: So attractive but the date mechanism never worked on it. Upsetting, it sucks giving a present to someone that is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice watch, good sturdy feel. My watch did not come in a zippered pouch as pictured, but rather a hard pleather box. Would have preferred the zippered pouch for storage/travel.
customer_reviews.author: Juicy Jay

customer_reviews.title: ... bowled over by the sheer elegance of both thewatch and it box that it sat in
customer_reviews.text: When it first arrived I was bowled over by the sheer elegance of both the watch and it box that it sat in. A stylish black face and genuine leather band gives me the impression that it costs more than it does. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. Popwel

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, too large in diameter
customer_reviews.text: A little too large for its simple design. Does it really cause women to swoon at your masculinity? The combination of the tan leather and the black watch face and case is indeed very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Doug E., College Station

customer_reviews.title: I like the simple styling of this watch
customer_reviews.text: MVMT customer service is outstanding! I like the simple styling of this watch, but the face was losing time. MVMT promptly replaced, no questions asked!
customer_reviews.author: SRE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch great quality feel. Holds up in the shower and black finish is durable, I have no nicks after more than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Torres

customer_reviews.title: ... got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he LOVED it. He got a lot of compliments on ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he LOVED it. He got a lot of compliments on it within the first week of wearing it. Definitely suggest it!
customer_reviews.author: JulieC

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Received the watch today and so far It's excellent! Great quality and awesome price. Came in a nice box as well
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Cleary

customer_reviews.title: I hope it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I hope it lasts, I dropped it on the floor face down and the back popped off, I got it back after some good pressure put on it
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Navis

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Watch came dead on arrival, probably dead battery. Tried to open the backplate that had no notches but to no avail. Will have to take it to a shop.
customer_reviews.author: JdotTdot23

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: Simple yet classy. Can’t wait to purchase different bands for it. Love this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Abdon Mora

customer_reviews.title: Much better in person and is the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This watch definitely surprised me when I got it. Much better in person and is the perfect size. My wrist are on the bigger size and the face is just perfect. It's not heavy and the case comes with is nice. All around good watch and professional and sporty feeling
customer_reviews.author: bryce salasky

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my father for father's day
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. Wears it everyday. Thank you mvmt and Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel HAll

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and accurate at an amazing value
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. He has several watches but his two MVVT watches are the ones he wears most often.
customer_reviews.author: virginia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this watch! Love it! Looks so nice on!
customer_reviews.author: Dskob

customer_reviews.title: The price is good.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design very cool watch what I did not like is that it's not a automatic u guys have to make a automatic.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi R.

customer_reviews.title: A simply beautiful minimalist watch
customer_reviews.text: A simply beautiful minimalist watch. I have not gotten any compliments but I do not get out much and do not like to use contractions. The watch looks much better in person compared to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF HECK

customer_reviews.title: It is a great looking watch that isn't too dressy or too casual
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husbands birthday. He loves it. It is a great looking watch that isn't too dressy or too casual, it can go both ways easily. The size is great also.
customer_reviews.author: JM Long

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gift for Valentine’s Day!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my boyfriend for Valentine’s Day and he has been wearing every day since then. He loves it! Not so big and not so small, just right!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Miramontes

customer_reviews.title: Great leather strap watch for a little over a100 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch it looks great and it does what it is supposed to do. While looking good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but quality is mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Nice and stylish watch that's relatively inexpensive. The quality of the wristband however is mediocre. Some of the stitches are coming off and it discolored after contact with water.
customer_reviews.author: Vasilis Papanikolaou

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my husband as a gift and he loved it! Looks much nicer in person than in the picture. Looks like a very expensive watch for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: DFT

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Watch!
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks great. Love the look of their minimalist watches. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: The package had a women's watch in the box when given on Chriatmas day. Should have been a mens watch.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Super nice watch. My boyfriend loves it. Will purchase again if it’s necessary
customer_reviews.author: nia

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch I have. Big wrist and it fits and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: As magnificent as its pictures
customer_reviews.text: This truly a beautiful and unique watch. My concern that it would not look as fantastic as the pictures portray it. However, it does.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Henry, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch great cost!
customer_reviews.text: my partner loves this watch! it's absolutely stunning! the quality is great and it's very lightweight, it makes any casual look appear more refined!
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for the price! My dad loved it! My husband has a few from this brand and they have all been amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price! Bought as a gift for my brother and he wears it often! Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Face falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Sleek and minimalist. Loved it until the face started to fall apart, the metal hour point fell to the bottom of the watch after a few months. no way to return.
customer_reviews.author: FellowservantinChrist

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and stylish looking watch. Great value! The watch looks more expensive than it is. The packaging was top notch also.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thompson

product_meta.title: MVMT Men's Minimalist Vintage Watch with Analog Date
product_meta.description:

feature_bullets: MVMT Classic is the quintessential minimalist timepiece; featuring a 45MM diameter, 9MM thick case; movement is battery-powered 3-hand Miyota Quartz with date
Strap is black and crafted from 100% genuine leather; the strap is easily interchangeable so you can explore a variety of strap fits and styles for every occasion

The watch's black case is made from brushed stainless steel, and hardened mineral crystal provides the glass with extra fortification; gunmetal hands and markers as well as a red second hand are set against a black dial
This minimalist watch is durable as well, with weatherproofing up to 3 ATM/30 Meters; this makes the watch suitable for carefree daily use, but it should not be submerged in water
Designed in the USA at MVMT's Los Angeles headquarters; we offer a two-year guarantee on everything we make
